value.title: StarCraft 2: Clem's NEW Ghosts vs MaxPax! (ESL Finals)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of top level StarCraft 2 played on the new multiplayer balance patch. In this series of games we have MaxPax facing off against Clem. The most significant changes for Terran for this matchup on the new patch are the Cyclone rework, the Ghost nerf and the Raven nerf. For Protoss the Tempest

value.title: StarCraft 2: Dark's ULTRA RUSHES Clem! (Best-of-3)
